emails.subject: Time to Submit Your Direct Admit Student Profile
emails.body:
Hi Kieran,

                                    As you consider what your future college plans could look like, what's important to you?

                                    There are many opportunities for you to make connections and memories that last at Cornerstone University. From hands-on academics to a vibrant campus community <https://www.cornerstone.edu/student-life/on-campus-experience/?utm_campaign=sr-prosp_apply_fa26&utm_content=email_11&utm_medium=email&utm_source=connect>, we want you to be a part of what makes Cornerstone a college destination of choice!

                                    At Cornerstone, there's room for you to dig deep into what you're passionate about and grow in new ways. You can apply what you learn through a faith-based lens and step into the world well-equipped to succeed in your future career.

                                    Your direct admission offer is still available! As your next step, complete your Direct Admit Student Profile <http://www.cornerstone.edu/direct-admission?utm_campaign=sr-prosp_apply_fa26&utm_content=email_11&utm_medium=email&utm_source=connect> below.                                  


Complete My Profile <https://www.cornerstone.edu/direct-admission?utm_campaign=sr-prosp_apply_fa26&utm_content=email_11&utm_medium=email&utm_source=connect>

                                    I'd love to connect you with an admissions counselor to help answer your questions. Please reply to this email or call our Admissions Office at 616.222.1426.                                  


​Blessings,
Colleen Cox, B.S. '10, MBA '19
          Executive Director of Admissions
​



 ​Contact Us <https://www.cornerstone.edu/about/contact/?utm_campaign=sr-prosp_apply_fa26&utm_content=email_11&utm_medium=email&utm_source=connect>

Visit Campus <https://www.cornerstone.edu/admissions/visit-cornerstone/?utm_campaign=sr-prosp_apply_fa26&utm_content=email_11&utm_medium=email&utm_source=connect>

Apply Now <https://www.cornerstone.edu/admissions/apply/?utm_campaign=sr-prosp_apply_fa26&utm_content=email_11&utm_medium=email&utm_source=connect>




                              Copyright © 2025, Cornerstone University
                              1001 E Beltline Ave NE, Grand Rapids, MI 49525                            





​


This email was sent to jkgwnjk4@duck.com by Colleen from Cornerstone.
Cornerstone University, 1001 E Beltline Ave NE, Grand Rapids, MI 49525
Unsubscribe from Cornerstone University. <https://connect.cornerstone.edu/go?r=optout&mid=417a48b0-3fa2-48d2-89bd-a8de12d028ee&utm_campaign=sr-prosp_apply_fa26&utm_content=email_11&utm_medium=email&utm_source=connect>

emails.subject: Apply for the President's Ministry Impact Scholarship
emails.body:
Kieran,



                                If you have a parent who is in full-time ministry at a church, Christian school, camp, or other parachurch organization, you qualify to apply for the President's Ministry Impact Scholarship <https://www.cedarville.edu/financialaid/President-s-Ministry-Impact-Scholarship> at Cedarville University. This scholarship celebrates Cedarville's strong support of the local church and those who invest their lives in full-time vocational ministry.                              

                                Students who are selected for the scholarship may be awarded up to $7,000, which is renewable for all four years if you meet academic requirements.                               

                                If you fit the criteria for this scholarship, go online <https://www.cedarville.edu/financialaid/President-s-Ministry-Impact-Scholarship> to learn more about this scholarship and apply. The application deadline is February 15, 2026.                              





                                               

                                               
Follow Us on Social


                                               


This email was sent to college@kieranklukas.com by Cedarville University.
Unsubscribe from Cedarville University Undergraduate Emails. <https://connect.cedarville.edu/go?r=optout&mid=1502523f-c869-49b6-b6a3-b78b41bbefed>
